bibl.seg: Eleanor Dickey, The Colloquia of the Hermeneumata Pseudodositheana. Volume I. Colloquia Monaciensia-Einsidlensia, Leidense-Stephani, and Stephani = Cambridge Classical Texts and Commentaries. 49.
Cambridge, Cambridge University Press, 2012, 4°, 288 pp., 23 figg., 12 pll. ISBN 978-1-107-02010-8. £90.
See in part. pp. 4-15: Language learning in Antiquity [with a full list of all surviving Latin-learning materials].
